Package org.tweetyproject.commons.postulates

Class PostulateEvaluator<T extends Formula,U extends BeliefSet<T,?>>

java.lang.Object
org.tweetyproject.commons.postulates.PostulateEvaluator<T,U>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of formulas used in the evaluation.
U - The type of belief bases used in the evaluation.
public class PostulateEvaluator<T extends Formula,U extends BeliefSet<T,?>> extends Object
Evaluates some approach (reasoner, measure, etc.) wrt. a series of rationality postulates on a given series of knowledge bases.
Author:
Matthias Thimm

    • evaluate

      public PostulateEvaluationReport<T> evaluate(long num, boolean stopWhenFailed)
      Evaluates all postulates of this evaluator on the given approach on num belief bases generated by the sampler of this evaluator.
      Parameters:
      num - the number of belief bases to be applied.
      stopWhenFailed - if true the evaluation of one postulate will be stopped once a violation has been encountered.
      Returns:
      a report on the evaluation

    • evaluate

      public PostulateEvaluationReport<T> evaluate(long num)
      Evaluates all postulates of this evaluator on the given approach on num belief bases generated by the sampler of this evaluator. The evaluation of any one postulate will be stopped once a violation has been encountered.
      Parameters:
      num - the number of belief bases to be applied.
      Returns:
      a report on the evaluation
